loisleeeeeee,

To download anything using the torrent (file-sharing) system, you need to install a program like BITLORD.

Once you have that installed, you just click on the 'Download this torrent' link and get started (it will open bitlord automatically).
how do i play this?

These MP3 files seem to have been recorded in MP3-PRO format, rendering them incompatible with the majority of players and utilities, so if anyone's interested in joining the tracks together into complete chapters, please be very careful, as the time index settings are incorrect and will lead to the last 20 seconds or so of each file being truncated.

I had to first convert them (using Music Fan's Factory) before joining them with HiFi MP3 Joiner.  It took me almost 40 minutes to find out the files I was creating were damaged, and another 30 to figure out why!

Beware!

If anyone wants the set uploaded, repaired of course, PM me and I'll create the torrent for you guys.

Cheers!
